pkgmetadata.longdescription: Accompanies Bart, Rebecca, *et al.* High-throughput genomic sequencing of Cassava Bacterial Blight strains identifies conserved effectors to target for durable resistance. *PNAS Plus*.Currently depends on `clustalw <ftp://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/software/clustalw2/2.1/>`_ and `BLAST <ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/blast/executables/blast+/LATEST/>`_.You can grab the most current code from `github <https://github.com/sonwell/biotools>`_ or via git git clone git://github.com/sonwell/biotools.git
